name: Autosys
0:
”Alexa, Turn on TV Light”
”Alexa, Set Fan speed to 7”
”Alexa, Switch off Bedroom”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Prerequisites: 
It is necessary to have Autosys device installed at your place.
The user has to register using registration process.
Then he or she can use the same email id and password to link Alexa's account.

With the Autosys skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Autosys switches, fans & curtains. To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your Autosys account and say, "Alexa, discover devices”. 
The Autosys Smart Home skill functionality is compatible with Autosys devices.

Rooms: 
To control several devices in the same room, simply tell Alexa to turn on room name. 
- “Alexa, turn on Bedroom”.
- “Alexa, switch off Kitchen
Switch Controls:
- “Alexa, turn on ceiling light”
Curtain Controls:
- “Alexa, switch on bedroom curtain”
Fan:
- “Alexa, switch on Fan”
- “Alexa, set Fan speed to 7”


Using this skill user can do the following things:
1. To turn Bedroom lights on say - "Alexa, turn on Bedroom lights"
2. To turn Cove lights off say - "Alexa, turn off cove lights"
